snippet: Tucker Fredricks won the men’s 500 meters and Heather Richardson took the women’s 1,000 meters in a World Cup speedskating event.
abstract: American Tucker Fredricks wins men’s 500 meters in World Cup speedskating event in Calgary, Alberta, beating the world and Olympic champion Mo Tae-bum of South Korea; other speedskating news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tucker Fredricks won the men’s 500 meters and Heather Richardson took the women’s 1,000 meters in a World Cup speedskating event.

headline.main: U.S. Speedskaters Win at World Cup
